task.title: Transferring or Releasing a License Key

keywords.indexterm: Licensetransferring a license keyreleasing a license keyunregistering a license key

taskbody.context: If you want to transfer a license key to another user, or release a floating license so that someone else can use it, you must first unregister your license. The other user can then register their license in the normal way.The procedure below does not match the interface in my copy of Oxygen (XML Editor 16.0, build 2014070913) There is no second Register in the dialog that is displayed by the first Register, the license key area is already empty, and there is no reset button.

step.cmd: Go to menu Help Windows Register Preferences oXygen Register
step.stepresult: This displays the license registration dialog.

step.cmd: Make sure the text area for the license key is empty.
Make sure the option Use a license server is not selected.
Press the OK button of the dialog.

Select between falling back to the license key entered previously (for the case of releasing a floating license and reverting to Named User license) and removing your license key from your user account of the computer using the Reset button.
step.info: The Reset button erases all the licensing information. To complete the reset operation, close and restart .
